author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Malindo Air commences flights to Trivandrum, IndiaTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Malindo Air commences flights to Trivandrum, India
Malindo Air has commenced flights to its sixth destination in India, Trivandrum. Malindo Air, Malaysiaâ€™s first hybrid airline, already runs flight to five more Indian destinations namely Delhi, Mumbai, Trichy, Kochi and Vishakapatnam.
The four weekly flights from Kuala Lumpur to Trivandrum are on Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Saturday, with promotional fares on Business Class starting from RM469 one-way and Economy Class from RM309 one-way.
Concurrently, Malindo Air has announced the launch of new direct flights from Penang to Trichy, India beginning Sept 26, 2015 with twice-weekly flights every Tuesday and Saturday.
The airline said in a statement said that Malindo Air is the only carrier to ply the route with a direct flight from Kuala Lumpur.
